hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#Install dependecies sudo apt-get update -y && sudo apt-get install -y git openjdk-8-jdk wget liblocales-perl libghc-old-locale-dev locales-all libboost-locale-dev locales
#Set Environmental variables export JAVA_HOME=/usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-s390x export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version export JAVA_TOOL_OPTIONS=-Dfile.encoding=UTF8 export _JAVA_OPTIONS="-Xmx10g" export LANG=en_US.UTF-8
#Download the source code git clone git://github.com/hibernate/hibernate-orm.git cd hibernate-orm git checkout 5.2.10
#Build mkdir -p $HOME/.gem/jruby/1.9 ./gradlew build -x :documentation:renderGettingStartedGuides -x :documentation:renderIntegrationGuide -x :documentation:renderUserGuide -x test
#Run testcases cp build.gradle build.gradle.org sed -i '236s/512M/1024M/' build.gradle sed -i '239s/2G/10G/' build.gradle git diff ./gradlew test
sleep 60s ps -aef
pgrep -d" " -f "gradle" | xargs kill; sleep 30 ps -aef
